capabilityDescription.en: Sends the contents to a specified Amazon Lambda Function. The AWS credentials used for authentication must have permissions execute the Lambda function (lambda:InvokeFunction).The FlowFile content must be JSON.
capabilityDescription.zh: 将内容发送到指定的Amazon Lambda函数。用于身份验证的AWS凭据必须具有执行Lambda函数（Lambda:InvokeFunction）的权限。FlowFile内容必须是JSON。

en.description: Specifies the Proxy Configuration Controller Service to proxy network requests.

zh.description: Specifies the Proxy Configuration Controller Service to proxy network requests.

en.description: Endpoint URL to use instead of the AWS default including scheme, host, port, and path. The AWS libraries select an endpoint URL based on the AWS region, but this property overrides the selected endpoint URL, allowing use with other S3-compatible endpoints.

zh.description: 要使用的端点URL，而不是AWS默认值，包括方案、主机、端口和路径。AWS库根据AWS区域选择一个端点URL，但此属性覆盖所选的端点URL，允许与其他S3兼容的端点一起使用。

en.description: The Controller Service that is used to obtain AWS credentials provider

zh.description: The Controller Service that is used to obtain AWS credentials provider

failure.en: FlowFiles are routed to failure relationship

success.en: FlowFiles are routed to success relationship

aws.lambda.exception.error.code.en: Exception error code on invoking from AWS Lambda
aws.lambda.exception.error.code.zh: 从AWS Lambda调用时出现异常错误代码

aws.lambda.result.status.code.en: Status code in the result for the message when posting to AWS Lambda
aws.lambda.result.status.code.zh: 发布到AWS Lambda时消息结果中的状态代码

aws.lambda.result.log.en: Log in the result of the message posted to Lambda
aws.lambda.result.log.zh: 登录发布到Lambda的消息的结果

aws.lambda.exception.status.code.en: Exception status code on invoking from AWS Lambda
aws.lambda.exception.status.code.zh: 从AWS Lambda调用时的异常状态代码

aws.lambda.result.payload.en: Payload in the result from AWS Lambda
aws.lambda.result.payload.zh: AWS Lambda结果中的有效载荷

aws.lambda.exception.request.id.en: Exception request id on invoking from AWS Lambda
aws.lambda.exception.request.id.zh: 从AWS Lambda调用时的异常请求id

aws.lambda.exception.message.en: Exception message on invoking from AWS Lambda
aws.lambda.exception.message.zh: 从AWS Lambda调用时出现异常消息

aws.lambda.exception.cause.en: Exception cause on invoking from AWS Lambda
aws.lambda.exception.cause.zh: 从AWS Lambda调用时的异常原因

aws.lambda.result.function.error.en: Function error message in result on posting message to AWS Lambda
aws.lambda.result.function.error.zh: 向AWS Lambda发布消息时，结果中出现函数错误消息
